# AppStoreVersionReleaseRequest

**Object**

The data structure that represents an App Store Version Release Request resource.

## Declaration

```swift
object AppStoreVersionReleaseRequest
```

## Objects

- **AppStoreVersionReleaseRequestCreateRequest**: The request body you use to manually release an App Store approved version of your app.
- **AppStoreVersionReleaseRequestResponse**: A response that contains a single App Store Version Release Request resource.
